storageClassName.description: Storage class name for the PVC. If null, defaults based on platform (azure: azurefile-sas, aws: efs-sc, kubernetes/openshift: nfs-client)

createStorageClass.description: Whether to create the storage class if it doesn't exist. If null, defaults based on platform (azure: true, others: false)

existingClaim.description: Existing claim name for the PVC (if not creating a new one). Leave empty to create a new PVC
